title:
I just saw the article about New Hope Presb.  



I would like to know if Hopewell Presb.  North of Burgaw on US 117 is on the Historical Register.



The church was founded in 1800 and is where Hinton James, the 1st student at UNC is interred.



Thanks,



Steve Z
text: Here's a link to the answer to your question. http://www.myreporter.com/?p=17605
